title: Vietnam social media user penetration 2017 to 2023
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of population. In total the number of data points it has is 7.
In general Share of population has rose over the Year.
Share of population is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2021, and lastly roughly constant from 2021 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Share of population, of value 52.0 was reached at Year 2022, and 2023
The lowest Share of population, of value 46.0 was reported at Year 2017
